reference_a:
@article{habets2020,
  title = {Mobile health daily life monitoring for parkinson disease: {{Development}} and validation of ecological momentary assessments},
  shorttitle = {Mobile health daily life monitoring for parkinson disease},
  author = {Habets, Jeroen and Heijmans, Margot and Herff, Christian and Simons, Claudia and Leentjens, Albert FG and Temel, Yasin and Kuijf, Mark and Kubben, Pieter},
  date = {2020-05-11},
  journaltitle = {JMIR mHealth and uHealth},
  volume = {8},
  number = {5},
  pages = {e15628},
  publisher = {JMIR Publications Inc., Toronto, Canada},
  doi = {10.2196/15628}
}
additional_comments: some variables only morning/evening, no beep information available

features.coding: NA

features.name: loc_where
features.coding:

25 = Friends
30 = Work
55 = A public place

90 = Somewhere else

40 = Colleagues
50 = Strangers

features.name: act_what
features.coding:

10 = working
20 = housekeeping or house jobs
40 = leisure
41 = sports
89 = something else
00 = nothing
